comment: Very herbal, grassy, pleated. Not a huge fan.
Smooth with a very mild moth feel. The nose and taste are less pronounced than I had hoped
Peat but more subtle and bright and mid taste than laphroaig

Nosing: lightly peated sweetness

Flavour: very peppery and young whisky notes. But complexness in the whisky and it hits all notes of spicy, lightly salty, sweet, 

Finish: light peatiness
If you like Islay style, Talisker Storm, something like that, this smoky drink is for you. Not me.
